channel.title: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX
channel.description:
I have been working on this server for a while, I have been coding everything all by myself. When I started with the project I chose RscAngel's source, and I don't feel like changing the source yet. My ultimate goal is to create an 99% replica of original rsc, but with some small additons.
Some features that the server will have:
- 3x exp rate. - P2P mode. (In future there will be F2P events/areas) - All the original quests and the rewards. (Also the item requirements!) - No custom items nor npcs. - Max lvl 99. - Some noncombat skills will be "patched" so with 1 click you will do the action few times. (Depending on your skill level) - Shops will sell gear up to mithrill. - Clan system. (There will be option to disable clan tags in game chat) - Good host and ddos protection.
After the server is getting a stable economy and good player base I will start coding new quests and areas. This server is not one of the "2 month servers".
Theres no ETA since I'm doing everything myself, but before opening the server I will advertise it alot so everybody has equal chances to be #1 in something. It will be open before christmas tho, but maybe in October already.
Also I'm looking for a partner with java/rscd coding skills, pm me if intrested.
A picture of the website:
[IMG]http://i451.photobucket.com/albums/qq238/Kodekit/rsconyxwebsite.png[/img]

item.title: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:20, topic:410475"]How come I’m the only one from Finland that knows java around here?
I guess most finnish people are retarded.[/quote]
Yeah its actually true, we have a lot retards here in Finland.
But it has nothing to do with java knowledge
I would learn and understand java without any problems if I wasn’t just so lazy in reading books.
I’ve never actually liked reading, I guess it’s a habit of the new generation

[quote=“A Gh0st, post:21, topic:410475”]Why do something that someone else has already done? There is already a private server out (RSCE) that is a replica of RSC. Be different… be creative… Surprise the community. But I’m sure a lot of people will join anyways, as everyone likes a fresh start and it is almost impossible for new players to get a partyhat or any other rare these days. I highly suggest raising the xp rate… No one will play a 3x server. For those people saying you will only get 20 people, I’m confident you will get a lot more if you manage it well.[/quote]Nobody has done it tbh.
RSCA was at it’s time the most closest replica.
Nowadays its RSCE, imo. The thing I don’t like about RSCE is the economy, F2P-mode and few other things.
People loved RSCAngel and theres a lot people hoping that it never went down.
I’m kinda trying to follow the footsteps of RSCAngel.

Read full topic
item.source: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX

item.title: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

Vicd:

My ultimate goal is to create an 99% replica of original rsc, but with some small additons.

Why do something that someone else has already done? There is already a private server out (RSCE) that is a replica of RSC. Be different… be creative… Surprise the community. But I’m sure a lot of people will join anyways, as everyone likes a fresh start and it is almost impossible for new players to get a partyhat or any other rare these days. I highly suggest raising the xp rate… No one will play a 3x server. For those people saying you will only get 20 people, I’m confident you will get a lot more if you manage it well.

But… if you are too lazy to learn how to code java then you will not have a successful server.

Godandjesus:

Whats the point showing up picture of website? It doesn’t affect in gameplay and server sounds like complete garbage. Sorry, but you won’t get over 20 players. This fails and won’t last over 2 weeks.

Constructive criticism or go away. Read the rules.

Read full topic
item.source: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX

item.title: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Vicd, post:19, topic:410475”]Some updates…
I got stuck with the server coding because I don’t have the patience to read java books
Anyway, I worked a bit more on the website, changed the overal appearence.
I wanted it to be simple and plain:

I also made decisions, there will be only a webclient, and I’ll use PunBB 1.3 forums. (Game and forums will be separated)
I’m planning to adjust the server so there won’t be such large amounts of GP like in other servers.
Going to implent few ideas that will charge GP from players, adjust the monster GP drops and lower the amounts of GP you get from alching.

I’m currently working on the webclient, got the source from PKScape.
A lot work to do, but I have time. (Would be faster if there was somebody helping, but I don’t know anybody)

About hosting plans: the server is going to be hosted at Finland, with a DDOS protection.[/quote]
How come I’m the only one from Finland that knows java around here?
I guess most finnish people are retarded.

Read full topic
item.source: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX

item.title: Upcoming Private RSC Server - RSC ONYX
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

Some updates…
I got stuck with the server coding because I don’t have the patience to read java books
Anyway, I worked a bit more on the website, changed the overal appearence.
I wanted it to be simple and plain:

I also made decisions, there will be only a webclient, and I’ll use PunBB 1.3 forums. (Game and forums will be separated)
I’m planning to adjust the server so there won’t be such large amounts of GP like in other servers.
Going to implent few ideas that will charge GP from players, adjust the monster GP drops and lower the amounts of GP you get from alching.

I’m currently working on the webclient, got the source from PKScape.
A lot work to do, but I have time. (Would be faster if there was somebody helping, but I don’t know anybody)

About hosting plans: the server is going to be hosted at Finland, with a DDOS protection.

Read full topic
